Configuration.Name: L1=4m_L2=1p3m_offset
Configuration.SetupScript:
sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 25476') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 5.02')
#config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 300 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 40.279 config.beamcenterz = 96.5278 config.drive()
